GLOBAL.title: General Filling Instructions
GLOBAL.instruction: The form must be filled in BLACK ink and in CAPITAL LETTERS. All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory.
rejections: Form not filled in capital letters
Form not filled using black ink

PRIMARY_CUST_NAME.title: Primary Customer Name
PRIMARY_CUST_NAME.instruction:
Enter the full name of the first applicant in the box provided.
Example: 'RAJESH KUMAR SHARMA'
rejections: Name does not match ID proof

PRIMARY_CUST_ID.title: Primary Customer ID
PRIMARY_CUST_ID.instruction:
Enter your unique 8-9 digit Customer ID in this box.
Example: '10005678'

LOCKER_NO.title: Locker No.
LOCKER_NO.instruction:
Write the specific locker number assigned to you in this box.
Example: 'A-12' or 'L-105'

LOCKER_SIZE.title: Locker Size
LOCKER_SIZE.instruction:
Specify the size classification of the locker in this box.
Examples: 'SMALL', 'MEDIUM', 'LARGE', 'A', 'B'

LOCKER_KEY_NO.title: Locker Key No.
LOCKER_KEY_NO.instruction:
Enter the unique number engraved on the locker key in this box.
Example: 'K-204' or '998'

RENT_RECOVERY_ACC.title: Account for Rent Recovery
RENT_RECOVERY_ACC.instruction:
Enter the bank account number from which the annual rent will be deducted.
Example: '100012345678'

RENT_RECOVERY_NAME.title: Name of Account Holder (Rent Recovery)
RENT_RECOVERY_NAME.instruction:
Write the name of the person who owns the rent recovery account.
Example: 'RAJESH KUMAR SHARMA'

MODE_OPERATION.title: Mode of Operation
MODE_OPERATION.instruction:
Tick exactly ONE box to indicate how the locker will be operated.
Options:
1. 'Either or Survivor' (Any one can open)
2. 'Former or Survivor' (Only 1st holder can open during lifetime)
3. 'Jointly' (All must be present)
4. 'Anyone or Survivor'

AGREEMENT_RENT.title: Annual Rent Amount
AGREEMENT_RENT.instruction:
In the agreement text, enter the annual rent amount in Rupees.
Example: '3500'

NOMINATION_CHOICE.title: Nomination Selection
NOMINATION_CHOICE.instruction: Tick 'Yes' to add a nominee or 'No' to decline. (We recommend selecting 'Yes').

NOMINEE_1_NAME.title: Nominee 1 Name
NOMINEE_1_NAME.instruction:
If Nomination is 'Yes', write the 1st Nominee's full name.
Example: 'SUNITA SHARMA'
rejections: Nomination is Yes but name missing

NOMINEE_1_ADDRESS.title: Nominee 1 Address
NOMINEE_1_ADDRESS.instruction:
Write the full residential address of the 1st Nominee.
Example: 'Flat 402, Lotus Apt, MG Road, Mumbai'

NOMINEE_1_RELATION.title: Nominee 1 Relationship
NOMINEE_1_RELATION.instruction:
Write the relationship of the 1st Nominee to the hirer.
Examples: 'SPOUSE', 'FATHER', 'SON'

NOMINEE_1_DOB.title: Nominee 1 Date of Birth
NOMINEE_1_DOB.instruction:
Enter the 1st Nominee's DOB in DD-MM-YYYY format.
Example: '15-08-1985'

NOMINEE_2_NAME.title: Nominee 2 Name
NOMINEE_2_NAME.instruction:
Write the 2nd Nominee's name (if applicable for joint hirers).
Example: 'RAHUL SHARMA'

NOMINEE_2_ADDRESS.title: Nominee 2 Address
NOMINEE_2_ADDRESS.instruction:
Write the full address of the 2nd Nominee.
Example: 'Flat 402, Lotus Apt, MG Road, Mumbai'

WITNESS_1.title: Witness 1 Details
WITNESS_1.instruction:
REQUIRED ONLY FOR THUMB IMPRESSIONS. Enter Witness 1's Name and Address.
Example: 'AMIT PATEL, 12 Gandhi Nagar, Delhi'
rejections: Thumb impression used but witness missing

WITNESS_2.title: Witness 2 Details
WITNESS_2.instruction: REQUIRED ONLY FOR THUMB IMPRESSIONS. Enter Witness 2's Name and Address.
rejections: Thumb impression used but witness missing

HOLDER_1_PHOTO.title: 1st Holder Photograph
HOLDER_1_PHOTO.instruction: Paste a recent colour passport-size photograph of the 1st Holder in this box.

HOLDER_1_SIGN.title: 1st Holder Signature
HOLDER_1_SIGN.instruction: The 1st Holder must sign ACROSS the photograph and in the signature box below it.

HOLDER_2_PHOTO.title: 2nd Holder Photograph
HOLDER_2_PHOTO.instruction: Paste a recent colour photograph of the 2nd Holder (if applicable).
rejections: Joint account selected but 2nd photo missing

HOLDER_2_SIGN.title: 2nd Holder Signature
HOLDER_2_SIGN.instruction: The 2nd Holder must sign ACROSS the photograph and in the signature box below it.
rejections: Joint account selected but 2nd signature missing

HOLDER_3_PHOTO.title: 3rd Holder Photograph
HOLDER_3_PHOTO.instruction: Paste a recent colour photograph of the 3rd Holder (if applicable).

HOLDER_3_SIGN.title: 3rd Holder Signature
HOLDER_3_SIGN.instruction: The 3rd Holder must sign ACROSS the photograph and in the signature box below it.

OFFICE_USE_CABINET_ID.title: Cabinet ID (Bank Use)
OFFICE_USE_CABINET_ID.instruction:
Bank Official Use Only: Enter the Cabinet ID where the locker is located. 
Example: 'CAB-05'

OFFICE_USE_MASTER_KEY.title: Master Key ID (Bank Use)
OFFICE_USE_MASTER_KEY.instruction:
Bank Official Use Only: Enter the Master Key ID. 
Example: 'MK-101'
